MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 27-MAR-2021 01:57.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:52pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:01 PM on Friday, 26 March 2021.
